attributes.action: Prompt full scale investigation and review of policies
attributes.additional_details:
Failure to deliver any reasonable policies, results in driving population of UK into powerty, while endless profiteering of Energy suppliers is not only allowed, supprted, but directly encouraged.

Governemtn shall realize what the function and position is and should be and what is the function of private comanies. This is not business, energy companies do run uncontrolled business - lets thoughen the rulles preventing profiteering on our expense! give Ofgem the power to commence "referendum" review and allow people to have say, to cmplain and to take actions against profiteerers such Energy companies.

Set (as in the case of proposed Nuclear Power Station) quarantied KWh price - freeze the unjustified increase and punish all not playing by rules or give control to people / customers.
